## HideCursor class

Hide console cursor, this can only work when added to an Output stream.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class HideCursor extends Base<BaseData> 
```

|  [setCursor(stream, visible)](./flex-progress.hidecursor.setcursor.md) | <code>static</code> | Set cursor visible state |
